text: Bert J. Harris Jr. (December 9, 1919 - May 19, 2019) was an American politician. He was born in Warwick, Georgia. Harris Jr. was a member of the Democratic Party. He was in the Florida House of Representatives from 1982 to 1996 for district 77. Harris Jr. died on May 19, 2019 in Lake Placid, Florida at the age of 99. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Bert J. Harris Jr.
